long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your team spends 100s of hours in meetings each week, but is it time well spent? Find out! Let attendees rate meetings and see results, without leaving Google Calendar/email.

➤ How it works
1. Install retro.rsvp and click on a calendar event to request ratings from attendees
2. Attendees will receive a rating email after the event where they can submit a rating in 1 click (no install/signup required)
3. Results will be distributed via email after 24 hours (no install/signup required), or available in real-time via Google Calendar (install required)
